display_long_description:
You've just woken up from hibernation, still groggy and disoriented, when an urgent voice breaks through the haze, it’s the ship's AI. Your crew is in grave danger, scattered across the drifting vessel that’s barely holding together. Critical systems are failing, oxygen levels are dropping, and a mysterious presence seems to lurk in the shadows of the abandoned corridors. There’s no time to lose.

In Escape Room - Lost in Space, you’ll immerse yourself in a thrilling virtual reality experience that combines action with intricate puzzles. Navigate the ship’s treacherous interiors, restore vital systems, and uncover the dark secrets that led to the calamity. 
Each chamber presents unique challenges.
The clock is ticking, and every decision could mean life or death for your crew.

Will you rise to the occasion and reunite your team before it’s too late? Or will the vast emptiness of space claim you all? Gear up, think fast, and brace yourself for the ultimate test of wit and courage. Your mission: Escape. Save. Survive.
